overview:
Thiago Rigonatti has a differentiated career with over 8 years of experience in the TIC and Retail industries. He initiated his career in sales and training soon growing to new challenges in marketing, communications and events areas. Before joining B2W, Thiago worked at Apontador as a CMO, at UOL Host as Marketing Manager, and at Microsoft as Content Manager. He has also developed projects for Hewlett-Packard, Nokia and Intel. Thiago has an innovative vision on marketing strategies on the web environment and experience in ecommerce, market penetration, channels, partnerships and strategic planning. He is specialist in ecommerce, marketing and corporate mobile productivity. Having promoted consistent growth, Thiago has proven record results in sales and revenues. Thiago has international experience attending meetings and conferences in the US and Europe.

Specialties High growth strategies / Start-up Record Sales / Revenue increase ROI / Budget / P&L Leadership / Strategic Partnership and Alliances Project Management and Execution / B2B and B2C Channels Contract Management and Negotiation/ Web Technology / Usability Skills / Digital Marketing / Metrics Skills
